---

## Format Adherence

Each GMP file strictly adheres to:

✅ **GMPv1.6 Canonical Structure:**
- ROLE statement
- MODIFICATION LOCK (absolute constraints)
- L9-SPECIFIC OPERATING CONSTRAINTS
- STRUCTURED OUTPUT REQUIREMENTS
- PHASE 0–6 complete definitions
- Deterministic TODO plan (locked)
- Evidence-based checklist marking
- Single artifact output
- Final Definition of Done
- Final Declaration

✅ **Deterministic Execution:**
- No ambiguity or speculation
- Line-by-line code snippets
- Absolute file paths (/l9/)
- Action verbs (Replace/Insert/Delete/Wrap/Move)
- TODO INDEX HASH (deterministic checksum)
- Phase-by-phase STOP rules

✅ **No Tool Substitution:**
- Each GMP is 100% self-contained
- All phases included (0–6)
- All checklists evidence-based
- Single report per GMP
- Path format: `/l9/reports/exec_report_gmp_l<X>_<name>.md`

---

## Ready to Generate

The templates and formats are now ready for generation. Each file will be:

1. **Self-contained** — Complete GMP with all 6 phases
2. **Canonical** — Strict GMPv1.6 format compliance
3. **Deterministic** — Locked TODO plan, verifiable outcomes
4. **Evidence-based** — All checklist marks require proof
5. **Pre-requisite-aware** — References prior L-chain completion
